item.title: [Runtime Error] : Exception: Canvas does not allow drawing in line 104 in script
item.dc:creator: @iloveit8 iloveit8
item.description:
@iloveit8 wrote:

[Runtime Error] : Exception: Canvas does not allow drawing in line 104 in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\GameTab.scar

is the error i get, cant figure out what creates this error, it wasnt there untill i put this in:

procedure mining;
var
gx, gy : Integer;
i : Integer;
begin
 for i := 9 to 28 do
  begin
   FindNormalRandoms;
   MiningRandoms;
   if(findobj(gx, gy, 'mine', 11670708, 100)) then Mouse(gx,gy,2,2,true);//by Starblaster100 ty very much:)
   repeat
    wait(100);
   Until(ExistsItem(i) = true);
  end;
end;

well if anyone could help it would be nice… thanks for everyhelp

Read full topic
